text: @DailyCaller Nothing new @RepPeteKing always same song, same dance movement. While Cuomo & Health Dept were forcing Nursing Homes to take Covid-19 Patients, a death sentence for elderly Residents, did anyone hear King protest Gov Cuomo's orders. RINOs like leopards never change their spots.
